arts.ttl: Valencia call upon forward for first time since sexual assault accusation three months ago
arts.sum: At the start of September, Rafa Mir was arrested after being charged with alleged sexual assault – he was in custody for two days before being released, although the investigation is still ongoing. He was also provisionally suspended by Valencia, although he has been back in the first team reckoning for several weeks now. arts.ttl: Valencia pursue Alex Jimenez: Milan’s decision and Real Madrid’s Influence
